sentence: Reception and service was formal but very pleasant
Finding our room took a bit of fun doing as it was down several corridors and up three flights of stairs there are lifts available
The building this hotel sits in was built in the 140s so keep in mind somethings can be quirky like lower ceilings and hallways you can easily get lost in
It is an old historic building with low doorways and ceilings in the stairways so tall people have to be careful
This hotel is very old the light fixtures are low and you have to duck down when you take the stairs
The location could not be better however because the street is pedestrian the address of the hotel is not the best way to get to the hotel by car the best way is through the back entrance
Reception Concierge Room service Restaurants Bar Calling a taxi Dry Cleaning Breakfast etc
Make available in room coffee tea making facilities
Lots of heavy equipment during the week
The building was very old so you feel like walking through Hobiton when navigating to your room elevator or restaurant

it is beautiful amazingly clean and comfortable and as soon as you step in through the solid wooden entrance door you are transported in a fairy tale where the staff is extremely courteous and helpful and the turn down service yes leaves a lovely chocolate on your pillow every single night
Our room was a sunny huge corner room on the top floor as we had requested but away from the elevator also as we had requested

The bathroom was also sizable with separate shower and tub a huge vanity with lovely amenities and a separate WCLocation right on the main street in Old Town Salzburg walking distance to almost anything in the tourist sector of the city the Goldener Hirsch offers not only elegant if not formal service but a great home base to explore the city
It is located in Getreidegase the most fashionable shopping lane in Salzburg and very close to the Large Festival Hall
It is ideally located and cute as a button

Walk out the hotel entrance and you are right in the middle of one of the most charming streets in Old Town brimming with cafes beautiful shops and boutiques as well as Starbucks and a great little market that manages to sell everything you could need from a good wine selection to fresh fruit and carry out for breakfast lunch and dinner
Staff is top notch and the accommodations are comfortable and cozy
The Hotel Goldener Hirsch offers a unique Starwod Luxury Collection Accommodation in the very heart of historic Salzburg
Wonderful accommodations in the center of it all
Aside from being a fabulous facility the locations was perfect
